Subjects: carols, amorous; love, vicissitudes of; chansons d’aventure
_description: A disconsolate mistress comforted — nine six-line tail-rhyme stanzas with 2-line burden: ‘Hey nony nony nony nony no’ (repeated)

BLAdd31922.First Lines: This other day I hard a mayryght peteusly complayne…
BLAdd31922.Last Lines: …They day thay spent to ther intentIn wyldernes alone
